text: Stadtallendorf is a town in the county of Marburg-Biedenkopf, Hesse, Germany. It lies about east of Marburg. In 2010, the town hosted the 50th Hessentag state festival. File:Stadtallendorf Mosque1.jpg|Mosque File:Stadtallendorf Mosque2.jpg|Mosque side view File:Stadtallendorf Ferrero Factory.jpg|Ferrero factory == Geography == === Location === Under the German system of Naturräume, Stadtallendorf lies in the West Hesse Depression zone (westhessische Senkenzone) which is divided into basins and ridges. With respect to these, the town lies on the Upper Hesse Ridge which separates the Amöneburg Basin in the west from the Schwalmbecken (another basin) in the east. On this ridge may also be found the Neustadt Saddle, abutted by the town's northeast edge. This upland is part of the divide between the Rhine and Weser watersheds. === Neighbouring communities === Stadtallendorf borders in the north on the town of Rauschenberg (Marburg-Biedenkopf) and the community of Gilserberg (Schwalm-Eder-Kreis), in the east on the town of Neustadt, in the southeast on the town of Kirtorf, in the south on the town of Homberg (Ohm) (both in the Vogelsbergkreis), and in the west on the towns of Amöneburg and Kirchhain (both in Marburg-Biedenkopf). == Population == (in each case as of 31 December) * 1998 – 21,587 * 1999 – 21,643 * 2000 – 21,656 * 2001 – 21,671 * 2002 – 21,704 * 2003 – 21,708 * 2004 – 21,528 * 2006 – 21,540 * 2009 – 21,146 == City districts == File:Schweinsberg (Stadtallendorf) (05).jpg|Schweinsberg (Town) File:Erksdorf_church.jpg|Erksdorf File:Hatzbach church.jpg|Hatzbach File:Wolferode_church.jpg|Wolferode == References == == Other websites == * Category:Marburg-Biedenkopf
